Title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance, Thriller
Actors: Noah Wyle, Sonya Walger, Bob Newhart, Kyle MacLachlan
Plot: Flynn, an over 30 "professional student," is banned from more classes, since he already has 22 degrees. Unexpectedly hired by a mysterious library, he's soon pursuing a stolen artifact from the library, a pursuit taking him to far-off lands.
